mean_en: (in compounds) used to describe a traditional product, brand, breed of animal or plant variety, especially one that is old-fashioned, rare and of high quality
sentence: Embroidery is an important part of Chinese cultural heritage whose craft should be retained.
sentence_trans: 刺绣是中国文化遗产的重要组成部分，刺绣技艺应该保留下来。
word_etyma: herit继承 + age场所，物品 → 遗产
